channel.title: vPE - Runescape packet editing
channel.description:
[i]What is vPE?[/i] It logs runescape packets sent to and from the runescape server, allowing you to edit them.
[i]How can vPE help me?[/i] You may edit any 'sent' packets, fooling the server! Such as in a trade, put up lets say 300k then send the packet but edit it for 30k, and it will change it to 30k, but the other person still sees 300k! Works with a lot of other stuff like this.
[i]How can I get vPE?[/i] The download link is http://rapidshare.com/files/34907942/vPE-RSVersion.zip
[i]Is vPE safe?[/i] Yes! It only includes a small ad program in the install, but if you do not wish to install this program then just uncheck it.

item.title: vPE - Runescape packet editing

item.title: vPE - Runescape packet editing

item.description:
@CrypticX wrote:

What is vPE?
It logs runescape packets sent to and from the runescape server, allowing you to edit them.

How can vPE help me?
You may edit any ‘sent’ packets, fooling the server! Such as in a trade, put up lets say 300k then send the packet but edit it for 30k, and it will change it to 30k, but the other person still sees 300k! Works with a lot of other stuff like this.

How can I get vPE?
The download link is http://rapidshare.com/files/34907942/vPE-RSVersion.zip

Is vPE safe?
Yes! It only includes a small ad program in the install, but if you do not wish to install this program then just uncheck it.
